name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-fidelity wireless headphones with noise-cancellation and a 20-hour battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: A stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and a vibrant AMOLED display.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: A durable mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting and tactile switches.

name: 4K Monitor
description: A 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with stunning color accuracy and a sleek, modern design.

name: Ergonomic Mouse
description: An ergonomic wireless mouse designed for comfort and precision during long hours of use.

name: Laptop Stand
description: An adjustable aluminum laptop stand that improves ergonomics and keeps your device cool.

name: USB-C Hub
description: A versatile USB-C hub with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB-A, and an SD card reader.

name: Portable SSD
description: A compact and durable 1TB portable SSD with lightning-fast transfer speeds.

name: Webcam
description: A 1080p webcam with a built-in microphone, perfect for video conferencing and streaming.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: A portable Bluetooth speaker with rich, immersive sound and a waterproof design.

name: Gaming Chair
description: An ergonomic gaming chair with adjustable armrests, lumbar support, and a reclining feature.

name: VR Headset
description: A virtual reality headset that offers an immersive gaming and entertainment experience.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: A smart thermostat that learns your schedule and preferences to save energy.

name: Robot Vacuum
description: An intelligent robot vacuum that automatically cleans your floors and carpets.

name: Air Purifier
description: An air purifier that removes allergens, dust, and odors from your home.

name: Electric Kettle
description: A fast-boiling electric kettle with a sleek stainless steel design.

name: Coffee Maker
description: A programmable coffee maker that brews delicious coffee just the way you like it.

name: Blender
description: A powerful blender that can crush ice, make smoothies, and more.

name: Toaster
description: A 4-slice toaster with wide slots and multiple browning settings.

name: Air Fryer
description: A versatile air fryer that lets you cook your favorite fried foods with less oil.
